backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Lists implemented features, related files, components, tests, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing core frontend files and their roles in the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining global OKLCH color variables, theming tokens, and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing the root div and script loading the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component managing cart state and product navigation, rendering list or details view with header and footer.
frontend/src/components/ProductDetails.t: Displays full product info with image, description, price, add‑to‑cart button, and a fallback not‑found view.
frontend/src/components/ProductList.tsx: Renders a grid of product cards with view‑details and add‑to‑cart actions.
frontend/src/components/SportsShopHeader: Header showing the app title and dynamic cart count with icon.
frontend/src/data/products.ts: Defines Product type and exports a seeded list of five sports products.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, with query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider to manage Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, and logout helpers.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme settings, colors, fonts, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature definitions, and pending feature requests for the Sports Shop app.
